Hackathons_key2: Hackathons are conducted on two alternate Saturdays every month.
Hackathons_key3: During the Hackathons, we ask the students to make apps or we can also give topic completion.
Hackathons_key4: We also select winners when the topic is app creation, the selection panel is from outside.
Hackathons_key5: The Hackathons speed up the learning process and enhance the students' logical thinking abilities.
Hackathons_key8: Two Hackathons personal for your own progress on current topics.
